Name: Timeless Sandglass
FreeAction: Ignore all enemies until the next Ally or Group Ally Card is drawn.

Name: Spear of Valor
FreeAction: Cause 2 Points of Damage to the Epic Foe, regardless of location.

Name: Staff of Control
Action: Move the Epic Foe to an Outer Region of your choice.

Name: Celestial Guardian
Action: Reduce the Threat Level of the Capital City by 3. Must be in the Capital City.

Name: Elixir of Errand
FreeAction: Gain 2 Action Points to spend immediately.

Name: Zodiac Cloak
FreeAction: Shuffle 2 Ally or Group Ally Cards back into the Turn Deck and continue.

Name: Boots of Zephyr
FreeAction: For the rest of this Round, your Move Actions cost 0 Action Points.

Name: Hammer of Might
Action: Reduce the Threat Level of the Region you are in to 0.

Name: Shield of Aughmoore
Action: For the rest of this Round, you may Defend Regions without losing Health.

Name: Horn of Command
Action: Relocate any number of Heroes to any Region, this includes the Capital City.
